alert.note: Alert for Lower Jefferson; Upper Jefferson (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Lake Charles (Southeast Texas and Southwest Louisiana)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued November 30 at 6:19PM CST by NWS Lake Charles
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT WEST CENTRAL CAMERON PARISH... JEFFERSON AND WESTERN ORANGE COUNTIES THROUGH 700 PM CST... At 619 PM CST, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Stowell, or 7 miles southwest of Hamshire, moving east at 60 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Beaumont, Port Arthur, Orange, Nederland, Groves, Port Neches, Vidor, Bridge City, Hamshire, Central Gardens, Sabine Pass, Johnsons Bayou, Rose City, Port Acres, Orangefield, Fannett, La Belle, Southeast Texas Regional Airport, Winnie, and Sea Rim State Park. This includes Interstate 10 in Texas between mile markers 871 and 863, and between mile markers 850 and 832. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
